nodes.text: Renan Irongut was a harsh alcoholic drink that traditional bar-room rumor claimed doubled as a potent rust remover, though none had been known to actually test that claim. It typically cost between three and five credits per shot. After the death of his family who were caught in the crossfire between Imperial and Alliance forces, Riic Mardec spent much of his time drinking Renan Irongut and lum.
